channel.title: Grumpy Mid Dev
channel.description: Recent content on Grumpy Mid Dev

item.title: Build Deploy Prod
item.description: System is running Hello everyone! This is my blog. I’m a grumpy mid-level/almost-but-not-there-yet-senior software developer. Like most people, I decided that my opinions are so important that the world should be blessed with them. I would like to start this by making a confession: the real reason I’m doind this is because I’m in some sort of ‘dev middle-life carrer crisis’. Yes, after many years in this business, I don’t know why I do what I do.
